item.title: Riana add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Riana add a quote by Vicki Myron
item.description: "That's life. We all go through the tractor blades now and then. We all get bruised, and we all get cut. Sometimes the blade cuts deep. The lucky ones come through with a few scratches, a little blood, but even that isn't the most important thing. The most important thing is having someone there to scoop you up, to hold you tight, and to tell you everything is all right." -- Vicki Myron

item.title: Riana add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description:
"Peeta" I said "Stay with me"
I heard him say one word before the drigs pulled me under, I realised later that what he said was 'always" -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Riana add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You're a painter. You're a baker. You like to sleep with the windows open. You never take sugar in your tea. And you always double-knot your shoelaces." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Riana add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I remember everything about you," says Peeta, tucking a loose strand of hair behind my ear. "You're the one who wasn't paying attention." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Riana add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "And then he gives me a smile that just seems so genuinely sweet with just the right touch of shyness that unexpected warmth rushes through me." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Riana add a quote by Riana Ambarsari
item.description: "Every journey is personal. Every journey is spiritual. You can't compare them, can't replace, can't repeat. You can bring back the memories but they only bring tears to your eyes." -- Riana Ambarsari

item.title: Riana add a quote by Robert Davis Stevenson
item.description: "For my part, i travel not to go anywhere but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move" -- Robert Davis Stevenson

item.title: Riana add a quote by Riana Ambarsari
item.description: "It's not "jalan-jalan" nor "liburan". It's just something we do naturally. Like breathing and eating. It's basically living." -- Riana Ambarsari

item.title: Riana add a quote by Antoine De Saint-Exupery
item.description: "Teman-temanmu akan heran melihat kamu tertawa sambil memandang langit. Maka akan kamu katakan kepada mereka, 'Ya, bintang-bintang selalu membuatku tertawa!' Dan mereka akan menganggap kamu gila." -- Antoine De Saint-Exupery

item.title: Riana add a quote by Riana Ambarsari
item.description: "Serupa kekasih yang bangga, kulafaz kalimatMu tanpa jeda. --ketika doa terjawab seketika" -- Riana Ambarsari

item.title: Riana add a quote by Riana Ambarsari
item.description: "Keep it simple, keep it tasty. Salt, pepper and garlic. Shallot another day, lemon grass for nextweek. Nutmeg and cinnamon every now and then." -- Riana Ambarsari
